channel.title: Just getting started making mods, ran into a problem for which google is no help
channel.description:
I'm trying to follow the instructions on the Satisfactory Modding Documentation website on ficsit.app. I got as far as compiling my binaries and hit this problem: [https://i.imgur.com/9k3Kl4Q.png](https://i.imgur.com/9k3Kl4Q.png).
I've tried running Visual Studio as an administrator and a few other unsafe tricks to give the batch files permission to run, but no dice. Anyone have any suggestions?

item.title: Just getting started making mods, ran into a problem for which google is no help
item.dc:creator: @genghiskhanx Genghiskhanx
item.description:
@genghiskhanx wrote:

For anyone curious, this thread solved my problem:
https://forums.ficsit.app/t/factorygame-could-not-be-compiled-try-rebuilding-the-source-manually/1027/8

Read full topic
item.source: Just getting started making mods, ran into a problem for which google is no help
